pullRequest.title: [CALCITE-4063] Unnest an array of single-item structs causes ClassCastException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Jira: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CALCITE-4063
There is a mismatch regarding what an UNNEST of a "simple" ROW (just 1 item) is expected to return as element type (scalar), and what its enumerable actually returns (List).
Solves the issue by using a special lambda for selectMany in these situations.

nodes.bodyText: Should these all really be unordered? I'm not sure what other implementations do, but I would have expected array elements to remain in order (same for the tests below).
